title: Riot Support Dont Want to Recover My account
body: Hi , This is My Problem Here , Which i Gave this Support with the name Wollo , All the information he want , the day i created my account , original email ,5 champions i remember that i bought first , Location , Ip etc.. , i never Puchased riot points and he still asking me to verify with  a proof of any payment , or linked paypal , while i never ever purchased Riot points on this account , I gave him all the real owner information , and he still refuse to help , but the problem is , he reply with the same answer like a robot , am i talking with a ROBOT then ? please help , i need to get back my account and change the email because its compromised , any help i will thankfull for it , cheers

replies.body: You're speaking with an account specialist, not a robot.  I know a lot of questions are being asked, and it's because our team won't recover an account unless they are absolutely sure it's being returned to the owner.  Even if you didn't make it this time, it's totally fine to try again!  Just fill out another [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will be happy to investigate further.  Good luck!

i did man , i legit give him all the information , he dont want to recover my account because i dont have any payment proof while i never purchased RP , thats the problem , can you please help me to recover it , i tried really hard , i mean like i was siting all day long waiting for the answer just to recover my account ,  i will truly appreciate any help
